item.title: Emirates has prohibited hoverboards and reminds passengers of the approved items for carry-on luggage
item.description:
Source: Emirates.Â Emirates reminds passengers to check before packing, for hassle-free travel this holiday season. Emirates Airlines is reminding travelers to review the allowed carry-on and checked baggage items for a smooth and secure journey during this holiday period. To maintain the safety of everyone onboard, loose lithium batteries used in devices like cameras, cell phones, and laptops are not allowed in checked luggage. This includes “hoverboards” or self-balancing scooters, whether or not the batteries have been removed...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-has-prohibited-hoverboards-and-reminds-passengers-of-the-approved-items-for-carry-on-luggage/
